name: Dual Opposition
description:
A two player party game where they compete in a rush of quick mini games each with a duality theme. Player 1 uses WASD, Player 2 uses the arrow keys, and each mini game will display instructions at the start.

Repository Link: https://github.com/Msciortino17/GGJ_2022

Credits:
